channel.title: 2 problems no one ever seemed to help me solve (repost)
channel.description:
sorry again that i accidently posted in the downlaods by accident i will not do that again i will read next time :) anyways back to my problem
ive been posting this over and over and over and i cant seem to get support
the first one is how do you make specs cause i need the specs for my godswords
and the second one is my npcs arent dieing and dropping items properly i mean the npc soldier drop stuff is in item2.java but everytime i kill a barrow brother or a man it either A. after its drained to 0 hp it just stands there and does nothing B. it dissappears and doesnt drop properly please fix this i want these 2 things solved

item.title: 2 problems no one ever seemed to help me solve (repost)
item.dc:creator: @Ncarug01 Ncarug01
item.description:
@Ncarug01 wrote:

Bacus23:

if u dont like the service here go to a different forum…runelocus google sythe…

yeah i use those
but im saying i like the service and i like moparscape but its just no one helped me on these 2 problems

Noob Slayerz:

Fix it your self lazy-ass.

who needed your opinion faggot

Read full topic
